meta.title: Lee's Summit R7 School District » Lee’s Summit R-7 School District is an exemplary school district, graduating students who are college and career ready with the competitive advantage necessary to be successful.

a.h3: 2020 Kindergarten Registration: Virtual Round Up events and registration dates
Watch a virtual art show featuring LSR7 Kiwanis Artists of the Year
LSR7 Update 4/3/20: Lee’s Summit R-7 School District announces updates to virtual instruction plan

img.alt: 2020 Kindergarten Registration: Virtual Round Up events and registration dates

div.h3: 2020 Kindergarten Registration: Virtual Round Up events and registration dates

div.p: Kindergarten Round Up information will be accessible virtually starting Tuesday, April 14, 2020. Read more for Round Up and registration information.

img.alt: Watch a virtual art show featuring LSR7 Kiwanis Artists of the Year

div.h3: Watch a virtual art show featuring LSR7 Kiwanis Artists of the Year

div.p: Each year, LSR7 names six Kiwanis Artists of the Year — an honor given to one art student at each middle and high school. Watch a virtual art show of these talented artists and read why their art instructors nominated them for the award.

img.alt: LSR7 Update 4/3/20: Lee’s Summit R-7 School District announces updates to virtual instruction plan

div.h3: LSR7 Update 4/3/20: Lee’s Summit R-7 School District announces updates to virtual instruction plan

div.p: While school closures extend through April 24, 2020, Lee’s Summit R-7 Schools will provide virtual learning. On April 3, 2020, the district announced updates to its virtual instruction plan. Starting this Monday, April 6, 2020, the district will designate Mondays as a planning and collaboration day for staff. Students will access virtual lessons Tuesday- Friday. Read the FAQ below for additional updates.

p.a: NEW: Virtual Instruction Plan Updates FAQ.

section.class: tm-main-top uk-grid uk-grid-collapse tm-block-divider uk-grid-divider uk-grid-collapse

li.div: I received a sweet note in the mail from one of my students. It arrived just when I needed it most. This made my day...actually made my week and was what I drew from during the next week of virtual learning to keep me positive. - Renee Lange, Summit Lakes Middle School learning specialist. Have a virtual learning story to share? Email communications@lsr7.net with a photo and a caption. #lsr7 #madeinr7 #r7proud #virtuallearning
Happy Administrative Professionals’ Day, LSR7! Let’s express our appreciation for our awesome team of administrative professionals. #lsr7
It’s #NationalLibraryWeek and here in #LSR7 we’d like to extend a huge thank you to our awesome R-7 library staff. Their support helps our students and staff thrive!

I forgot to turn something live this week and the student messaged me. I replied that I was sorry and I made a mistake. The second grade responded: That is okay. Then sent another message: We all make mistakes. I love that the kids are encouraging and so accommodating. - Kristen Wimberly, Longview Farm Elementary /// Have a virtual learning story to share? Email communications@lsr7.net with a photo and a caption. #lsr7 #madeinr7 #r7proud #virtuallearning #grace
The Board of Education has approved a new last day of school for the 2019-20 school year. #lsr7
Sharing information about Before and After School Services fall enrollment.
